title: I wanna play again.
body: After being banned for 1 week out of 2 i'm already wanting to play because of the new pre-season and that irelia is free to play and i want to try her out. rip. i understand why i was banned and that it wasn't necessary to do so. D: No season rewards either rip.

replies.body:
Well hopefully you can do what most summoners cant do, and that is
"Oh I got banned, man this sucks, maybe I should try muting others and being less toxic"

I don't know why or how you were banned, but who knows maybe the next one will be permanent.
But most summoners seem to be delusional that they didn't deserve it, or they know they deserved and just keep being toxic expecting not to be banned again.

Good Luck Have Fun!

From experience, getting banned leaves you 100x saltier than before. If you think most players be 'less toxic' after bans, they normally just find other ways to fuck people over, without getting banned. :)
